EmailTemplate.name: 16.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.N.G.N.2351.B.Email 8 - AirScale Services for Cloud RAN
EmailTemplate.subject: How to successfully ‘cloudify’ your radio access network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Expert Cloud RAN support from planning to operations Services for AirScale Cloud RAN <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200478]]> The right know-how to implement and run a Cloud RAN Our experts can help you cut the cost, complexity and time to plan and deploy your cloud-based radio access network. Our Cloud Operations service can even ensure it runs smoothly. Read the executive summary <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200478]]> ► Implementing and running Cloud RAN architecture requires in-depth know-how of the extreme reliability and scalability telecom requirements which differ substantially from standard IT deployments.
Nokia provides proven expertise to plan, design and implement cloud-based RAN solutions. © 2016 Nokia. Contact Us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Terms of Use <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/terms]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
